title: Deck of escape
data:
{{version030}} {{item |itemtype=Miscellaneous item |name=deck of escape |cost=500 |weight=5 }} {{flavour|A deck of magical cards, mainly dealing with various forms of escape.}} The '''deck of escape''' is one of [[Nemelex Xobeh]]'s decks. Under Nemelex, you can hold up to 13 cards of this deck. It contains the following cards:{{source ref|0.30.1|decks.cc|71}} *[[Cloud card|the Cloud]] (21.74%) *[[Elixir card|the Elixir]] (21.74%) *[[Exile card|Exile]] (13.04%) *[[Tomb card|the Tomb]] (21.74%) *[[Velocity card|Velocity]] (21.74%) __NOTOC__ ==Strategy== Like most [[Escaping from (and avoiding) trouble|escape items]], the deck of escape should be used early and often. Many of these cards can directly affect battles (Velocity, Elixir, Exile), while Tomb requires an open space to use. This deck is a strong contender for both Triple Draw and Stack Five, as the deck of escape has a strong variety of clashing effects. Conversely, Draw Four is relatively weaker; Tomb tends to be anti-synergistic with most other escape cards. ==See Also== *[[Cards]] *[[Decks]] ==History== *Prior to [[0.23]], decks were physical items. *Prior to the deck simplification in [[0.19]], the deck of escape was a physical deck, with cards from the [[deck of emergency]] and [[deck of transport]].
